charges.charge_description: Using, Carrying or Possessing a Firearm during and in relation to a Crime of Violence. Penalty: 5, 7, 10 yrs to Life, $250,000, $100 SPA, 5 yrs SRT(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 120 mos to serve, consecutive to 180 mos in Count 2, and Consecutive to State Case (Aggravated sexual assault); 5 yrs srt, concurrent to count 2, comply with all Applicable, Standard and Mandatory conditions of Supervision, $100 s/a per count; no fine; Restitution of $40 payable to Mr Navarro; drug/alcohol aftercare treatment and while at BOP; submit to substance abuse, testing, treatment, and abstinence condition; Mental health program and Anger management at BOP; waived appeal

charges.charge_description: Carjacking. Penalty: Not more than 15 yrs, $250,000, $100 SPA(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 180 mos to serve, consecutive to 120 mos in Count 1, and Consecutive to State Case (Aggravated sexual assault); 3 yrs srt, concurrent to count 1, comply with all Applicable, Standard and Mandatory conditions of Supervision, $100 s/a per count; no fine; Restitution of $40 payable to Mr Navarro; drug/alcohol aftercare treatment and while at BOP; submit to substance abuse, testing, treatment, and abstinence condition; Mental health program and Anger management at BOP; waived appeal

charges.charge_description: Possession of Firearm by convicted felon. Penalty: 0-10 yrs, $250,000, $100 SPA, 3 yrs SRT(3)
18:924(c) Carrying, using , Possessing Firearm in Connection with a Crime of Violence ;18:9119 Carjacking ; 18:922(g)(1) Possession of a Firearm by Convicted Felon.
